org.intellimate.izou.sdk.util

Interface ResourceCreator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContextProvider, Identifiable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentGenerator

    public interface ResourceCreator
extends ContextProvider, Identifiable
    provides various utility-methods to create Resources.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leander Kurscheidt
    See Also:
    Resource
